explains: n. 摇篮；吊架，吊篮；发源地；（电话的）听筒架； 摇篮
wordGroup: in the cradle 在摇篮里；在婴儿时期；初期
from the cradle 自幼，从小
from cradle to grave 一生（等于from the cradle to the grave）
rob the cradle [美俚]劫摇篮；老牛吃嫩草；与比自己年轻地多的异性约会

sentences.en: She rocked the baby to sleep in its cradle.
sentences.cn: 她摇动摇篮哄婴儿入睡。

sentences.en: The baby was rocked to sleep in a cradle.
sentences.cn: 婴儿在摇篮里被摇得睡着了。

sentences.en: A cradle is such a nice homely thing to have about a house.
sentences.cn: 摇篮在家庭中是一件很好的家常用品。
